title: LoL HFT #11 A Game of Close Escapes

embed.description: DESCRIPTION: There really was a comically large number of close escapes in this game. There's less creative editing in this one, was having a bit of a block and figured the clips mostly spoke for themselves here, but hope you enjoy nonetheless!

body: Let me know what you think! :)

replies.body: Hahaha this is pretty darn good can't believe some of those escapes though lol {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Well thank you! It's funny cause it honestly didn't feel like that kinda game when we were playing it, it was looking back I realised just how many times it happened, and not all of them were in the vid either :)
